content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Good afternoon, thank you for your interest in the apartment. It's a lovely 25 square meter space located in a prime area of the city. What rental price are you looking to pay monthly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am open to negotiating. I want to get the best deal possible. My budget is 700 Euros per month. What do you think we can agree on?
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Well, I'm glad to hear that you're open to negotiating. Based on the current market rates in this area, I think we can agree on a rental price of 750 Euros per month. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a prime location. Would you be willing to pay this amount?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can agree to that. I accept the rental price of 750 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Of course, I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. I'll send you the lease agreement for you to review and sign, and then we can discuss the move-in date. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
